osvSchema.details: A division-by-zero error on some AMD processors can potentially return speculative data resulting in loss of confidentiality.

description_data.value: A division-by-zero error on some AMD processors can potentially return speculative data resulting in loss of confidentiality.

descriptions.value: A division-by-zero error on some AMD processors can potentially return speculative data resulting in loss of confidentiality.
Un error de división por cero en algunos procesadores AMD puede potencialmente devolver datos especulativos que resulten en una pérdida de confidencialidad.
